data.event: The abbey was dissolved in 1537 in the course of the Reformation at which time the site became crown property.
The present farm buildings were erected in 1811 at the direction of Hilmar Meincke Krohg.

event.title: was purchased by the City of Trondheim in 1917

data.event: The farm was purchased by the City of Trondheim in 1917.

event.title: was acquired by the Reitangruppen in 1992

data.event: Lade farm was acquired by the Reitangruppen in 1992.
The buildings were restored and became their headquarters in 1995.
